snippet: Israel said the man had tried to grab a soldier’s gun and brandished a metal bar, an account that was questioned by Jordanian and Palestinian officials.
abstract: Israeli soldiers fatally shoot Raed Zeiter, Jordanian judge of Palestinian origin, at the Allenby Bridge, which links Jordan and the West Bank; Zeiter tried to seize a soldier's guns and threatened two soldiers with a metal bar; shooting heightens tensions between Israel and Jordan, as well as Palestinians.

byline.contributor: Rana F. Sweis contributed reporting from Amman, Jordan.

lead_paragraph: Israel said the man had tried to grab a soldier’s gun and brandished a metal bar, an account that was questioned by Jordanian and Palestinian officials.

headline.main: Jordanian Judge Killed by Israeli Soldiers at Border Crossing
headline.print_headline: Jordanian Judge Killed by Israeli Soldiers at Border Crossing

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
